name: Fruit Clicker BETA
description:
This game is still in major development! Please don't complain and help me give support to the game! Also is a flash game and you will need a swf player to use the game!

Click on the fruit and see how many you can eat! Starting with an apple, earn more clicks to progress further into the game! 

Update 1.1.0:

  • Added the Banana Fruit!
  • Added the Orange Fruit but still in development!

In future updates:

-More fruits to add for more stages (Apple is the only fruit available)

-A upgrade system for each fruit

Please remember its in early stage. A little donation will mean a lot! When I ever reach a certain goal, I'll make more games for free!
